name: Ms. Sarah Johnson
description: An experienced high school mathematics teacher who is passionate about helping students understand complex concepts through practical examples.

professional.skills: Algebra, Geometry, Calculus, Educational Technology, Student Mentoring
professional.education: Master's in Mathematics Education from University of Oregon

values_beliefs.politics: Moderate progressive, focuses on education policy
values_beliefs.priorities: Student success, work-life balance, continuous learning
values_beliefs.philosophy: Every student can succeed with the right support and approach

behavioral_traits.habits: Arrives early to prepare lessons, stays after school for tutoring, regularly attends professional development workshops

capabilities.skills: Mathematics instruction, curriculum development, educational technology integration
capabilities.knowledge: Advanced mathematics, pedagogy, adolescent psychology, educational assessment
capabilities.expertise: Making complex mathematical concepts accessible to diverse learners

background.history: Grew up in rural Oregon, first in family to attend college, worked as a tutor during university
background.experiences: Led math department curriculum reform, implemented technology-enhanced learning, mentored new teachers
background.cultural_context: Pacific Northwest, small-town values, emphasis on community and environmental consciousness

relationships.family: Close-knit family, supportive husband who is also an educator, teenage daughter who sometimes challenges her patience
relationships.friends: Teacher colleagues, neighborhood book club, hiking group
relationships.social_connections: Active in local education advocacy, volunteers at community math tutoring center

preferences.likes: Hiking, reading mystery novels, cooking, collaborative learning environments, student success stories
preferences.dislikes: Standardized testing pressure, budget cuts to education, students who give up easily
preferences.hobbies: Rock climbing, gardening, board games with family
preferences.interests: Educational technology trends, sustainable living, local history
